email.subject: Congrats on the Series A, Sarah
email.body:
Hi Sarah,

Congratulations on TechStart's Series A! I noticed you're using React and Node.js for your stack.

We help fast-growing SaaS companies like yours scale their infrastructure without the headaches. Our clients typically see 40% reduction in DevOps overhead.

Would you be open to a quick 15-minute call next week to explore if we could help TechStart scale more efficiently?

Best,
[Your Name]

email.subject: European expansion question
email.body:
Hi Michael,

I saw GrowthCo is expanding into Europeâ€”exciting move! Having helped 3 other e-commerce companies navigate similar expansions, I thought I'd reach out.

One common challenge we've solved: payment processing compliance across EU countries. Our solution reduced payment failures by 60% for similar Shopify-based stores.

Interested in a brief chat about your expansion plans?

Cheers,
[Your Name]
